description: Everything in module py3kcompat is ready in six > 1.4.0, we don't need this module now . It was removed from oslo-incubator recently, see  https://review.openstack.org/#/c/71591/.  This make us don't need maintain this module any more, use six directly.
title: Remove dependent module py3kcompat

comments.content: Everything in module py3kcompat is ready in six > 1.4.0, we don't need this module now . It was removed from oslo-incubator recently, see  https://review.openstack.org/#/c/71591/.  This make us don't need maintain this module any more, use six directly.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~glongwave

commit f75c253650a8a36005c325eb5fdce7c7f6a3eceb
Author: Jia Dong <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Feb 14 15:04:14 2014 +0800

    py3kcompat: remove in python-ceilometerclient
    
    Everything is already in six>=1.4.0 and we already depend on such a
    version. There's no reason to keep this file. So remove py3kcompat
    from python-ceilometerclient.
    
    Change-Id: Ide6876e7a60377cb3843816d1d9ab2c589bc8f1b
    Closes-Bug: #1280033
